name: The Wicher
description:
Genre: endless runner

You're a swirly wind flowing through the forest and you have to catch a flying leaves. You can switch and mix the color of your wind and pick up the right color of the leaves. Inspired by song "Kolorowy wiatr" from Pocahontas.


Controls:

Mouse - wind steering

Q - red color

W - green color

E - blue color

You can mix colors, for example pressing simultaneously red (Q) and green (W) will give yellow color.

Team:
